sentences.en: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will impute sin.
sentences.cn: 主不算为有罪的,这人是有福的.

sentences.en: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin.
sentences.cn: 8主不算为有罪的,这人是有福的.

sentences.en: Don't impute to me that you failed.
sentences.cn: 不要把失败的责任推到我身上.

sentences.en: How can you impute the blame to him?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能把过错转嫁给他?

sentences.en: How dare you impute such monstrous intentions to me?
sentences.cn: 你怎么敢把这些怪诞的意图归在我身上?

sentences.en: How dare you impute the failure to me?
sentences.cn: 你怎么敢把失败归咎于我 呢 ?

sentences.en: I impute his failure to laziness.
sentences.cn: 我把他的失败归咎于他的懒惰.

sentences.en: It is grossly unfair to impute blame to the United Nations.
sentences.cn: 把责任归咎于联合国是极不公平的。

sentences.en: Mr. Hill to impute the monstrous to her.
sentences.cn: 希尔先生试图把荒谬的企图归罪于她.

sentences.en: The happy impute all their success to prudence or merit.
sentences.cn: 幸运者都把他们的成功归因于谨慎或功德.

sentences.en: The individual behavior of game player how can impute to enterprise?
sentences.cn: 游戏玩家的个人行为怎么能转嫁给企业?

sentences.en: The police impute the rise in crime to high unemployment.
sentences.cn: 警方把犯罪增加的原因归咎于失业率太高.

sentences.en: The politician tried to impute some unfortunate remarks to his enemy.
sentences.cn: 这个政治家想把一些不当的言论转嫁到他的政敌身上.

sentences.en: To put the blame for; attribute or impute.
sentences.cn: 归咎于; 归因于,归罪于.

sentences.en: Well, why can't we impute the same sinister mentality to the deceased?
sentences.cn: 那好, 我们为什么不能来假定死者本身的行为带有恶意 呢 ?

sentences.en: Why do you impute selfish motives to her?
sentences.cn: 你为什么说她的动机是自私的?

words.tran_cn: 可归因的；可嫁祸的；使负责的
羞耻,不名誉,败坏,贬低,羞辱

trans.tran_cn: 归罪于, 归咎于, 归因于
trans.tran_en: If you impute something such as blame or a crime to someone, you say that they are responsible for it or are the cause of it
